name: Attempt
description:
Attempt is a simple-looking platform, suitable for casual and hardcore gamer!

The game uses a sophisticated physics engine that allows for directing the movement of a ball.

The ball will, in each level, reach the end of the level within a time limit.

Play in 3 different mode!
-------------------------------------
New Game mode: classic mode where the player will have to complete 30 levels.

Permadeath mode: a mode where the player will have to complete 30 levels with only one life available.

Challenge mode: a challenge pack consists of 15 levels in which the player will have to perform in spectacular maneuvers.
